mapper.sql: tplregionid, tpllayoutid, code, height, width, topoffset, leftoffset, zindex
mapper.delete: delete from tplregion where tpllayoutid in (#{ids})
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as tplregionid
insert into tplregion
tpllayoutid,
code,
height,
width,
topoffset,
leftoffset,
zindex,

mapper.update:
update tplregion
tpllayoutid = #{tpllayoutid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER},
width = #{width,jdbcType=INTEGER},
topoffset = #{topoffset,jdbcType=INTEGER},
leftoffset = #{leftoffset,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zindex = #{zindex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where tplregionid = #{tplregionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tplregion set tpllayoutid = #{tpllayoutid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, width = #{width,jdbcType=INTEGER}, topoffset = #{topoffset,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leftoffset = #{leftoffset,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zindex = #{zindex,jdbcType=INTEGER} where tplregionid = #{tplregionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
